alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 11:28AM PST until January 03 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Wind prone areas along US-395 and US-95 may see wind gusts to 60 mph. * WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
